mapper.select: SELECT ( SELECT COUNT(RESVE_NO) FROM resve_sttus WHERE RESVE_DE LIKE CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y%m'),'%') AND RESVE_EMPNO = #{empno} AND CANCL_YN != 'Y' ) AS RESVE_CNT , ( SELECT COUNT(RESVE_NO) FROM resve_sttus WHERE RESVE_DE LIKE CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y%m'),'%') AND WAIT_EMPNO = #{empno} AND CANCL_YN != 'Y' AND COMPT_YN != 'Y' ) AS WAIT_CNT

SELECT ( SELECT COUNT(RESVE_NO) FROM RESVE_STTUS WHERE RESVE_DE BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(CURRENT_DATE, '%Y%m%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 13 DAY), '%Y%m%d') AND RESVE_EMPNO = #{empno} AND CANCL_YN != 'Y' ) AS RESVE_CNT, ( SELECT COUNT(RESVE_NO) FROM RESVE_STTUS WHERE CONCAT(RESVE_DE, RESVE_TM) >= CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(CURRENT_DATE, '%Y%m%d'), #{nextResveTm}) AND RESVE_DE < DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 13 DAY), '%Y%m%d') AND WAIT_EMPNO = #{empno} AND CANCL_YN != 'Y' AND COMPT_YN != 'Y' ) AS WAIT_CNT

SELECT STTS.RESVE_NO, /* 예약번호 */ STTS.RESVE_DE, /* 예약일 */ STTS.RESVE_TM, /* 예약시간 */ STTS.BLD_CODE, /* 사옥코드 */ STTS.MSSR_EMPNO, /* 관리사사번 */ STTS.BED_CODE, /* 베드코드 */
STTS.COMPT_YN, /* 케어완료여부 */ STTS.SUCCS_YN, /* 승계여부 */ BED.CODE_NM AS BED_NM, /* 베드명 */ BED.CODE_ORDR, /* 코드순번 */ STTS.RESVE_EMPNO, /* 예약자사번 */ STTS.WAIT_EMPNO, /* 대기자사번 */ MSSR.NCNM AS MSSR_NCNM, /* 관리사닉네임 */ MSSR.SEXDSTN AS MSSR_SEXDSTN, /* 관리사성별 */ HIST.LAST_STTUS_CODE /* 마지막상태코드 */ FROM RESVE_STTUS STTS INNER JOIN ( SELECT T1.RESVE_NO, T1.STTUS_CODE AS LAST_STTUS_CODE FROM RESVE_HIST T1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT RESVE_NO, MAX(REG_DT) AS REG_DT FROM RESVE_HIST GROUP BY RESVE_NO ) T2 ON T1.RESVE_NO = T2.RESVE_NO AND T1.REG_DT = T2.REG_DT ) HIST ON STTS.RESVE_NO = HIST.RESVE_NO INNER JOIN MASSEUR MSSR ON STTS.MSSR_EMPNO = MSSR.EMPNO LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM CMMN_CODE WHERE CODE_TYL='BED' ) BED ON STTS.BLD_CODE = BED.CODE_TYS AND STTS.BED_CODE = BED.CODE WHERE STTS.RESVE_DE = #{resveDe} AND STTS.BLD_CODE = #{bldCode} AND STTS.CANCL_YN != 'Y' ORDER BY BED_CODE, RESVE_TM

SELECT A.RESVE_NO, A.RESVE_DE, A.RESVE_TM, A.BLD_CODE, A.MSSR_EMPNO, A.BED_CODE, A.RESVE_EMPNO, A.WAIT_EMPNO, A.REG_DT, A.UPDT_DT, A.CANCL_YN, A.COMPT_YN, A.SUCCS_YN, B.NCNM AS MSSR_NCNM, B.SEXDSTN AS MSSR_SEXDSTN, B.HFFC_YN AS MSSR_HFFC_YN, (SELECT CODE_NM FROM CMMN_CODE WHERE CODE_TYL='BLD' AND CODE = A.BLD_CODE) AS BLD_NM, (SELECT CODE_NM FROM CMMN_CODE WHERE CODE_TYL='BED' AND CODE_TYS=A.BLD_CODE AND CODE = A.BED_CODE) AS BED_NM, (SELECT CODE_NM FROM CMMN_CODE WHERE CODE_TYL='RVT' AND CODE = A.RESVE_TM) AS RESVE_TM_STR FROM RESVE_STTUS A INNER JOIN MASSEUR B ON A.MSSR_EMPNO = B.EMPNO WHERE RESVE_NO = #{resveNo}

SELECT * FROM RESVE_STTUS WHERE RESVE_DE=DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d') AND RESVE_TM = ( SELECT CODE FROM CMMN_CODE WHERE CODE_TYL = 'RVT' AND LEFT(CODE_NM,2) = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%H') ) AND CANCL_YN != 'Y' AND RESVE_EMPNO != '' AND RESVE_EMPNO IS NOT NULL

SUCCS_YN = #{succsYn},
UPDT_EMPNO = #{updtEmpno}, UPDT_DT = now() WHERE RESVE_NO = #{resveNo}
